script.exec: tests["User is activated"] = responseCode.code === 204;

script.exec: tests["User is Modified"] = responseCode.code === 204;

item.name: Get added Secondary Users

script.exec:
var jsonData = JSON.parse(responseBody);
tests["secondary User is added"] = jsonData.d.Id===environment['secodaryUserId']

item.name: 2. Entitlements
Revoking access for Transfers

script.exec: tests["Transfers is revoked for specified user"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: This case will revoke an entitlment for Transfers

item.name: Get Transfers for Secondary User

script.exec: tests["Response have Transfers as entitlement false"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>false</d:Entitled>");

request.description: Get Transfers for Secondary User

item.name: Granting access for Transfers

script.exec: tests["Transfers is granted for speciefied user"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: This case will revoke an entitlment for Transfers

item.name: Get Transfers for Secondary User- check granted Permission

script.exec: tests["Response have Transfers as entitlement as true"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>true</d:Entitled>");

item.name: 4. Entitlements with Accounts
*Get Accounts for Secondary User

request.description: Get Accounts for Secondary User

item.name: Revoking access for Transfers To for a particular account

script.exec: tests["Transfers to is revoked for account 660110110-2732731-1"] = responseCode.code === 204;

request.description: Revoking access for Transfers To for a particular account

item.name: Get Transfers to for Secondary User for a particular account

script.exec: tests["Response have Transfers To as entitlement false"] = responseBody.has("<d:Entitled>false</d:Entitled>");

request.url: {{env}}/cb/odata/services/retailuserservice/SecondaryUserProfiles('{{secodaryUserId}}')/Entitlements?$filter=OperationName eq 'Transfers To' and ObjectType eq 'Account' and ObjectId eq '{{Account}}'
request.description: Get Transfers to for Secondary User for a particular account

request.url: {{env}}/cb/odata/services/retailuserservice/SecondaryUserProfiles('{{secodaryUserId}}')/Entitlements?$filter=OperationName eq 'Transfers To' and ObjectType eq 'Account' and ObjectId eq '{{Account}}'
